price: 72. ¿Sois vosotros quienes habéis creado los árboles (con los que lo encendéis) o Nos?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anshatum shajaratahā am naḥnu al-munshiūna
